description:
Maximum of 20,000 words to be written on topic chosen by student. Students must contact the lecturer concerned and gain approval for the project; map out in some detail the format of the project; and present program in writing to the Postgraduate Coursework Advisor (History).
This course is for Part-time students commencing in Semester 2.
Part-time students commencing in Semester 1 are required to enrol in HIST7801.
Full-time students commencing Semester 1 OR Semester 2 enrol in HIST7802.
